name: Share Dealing UI
lead:
A part of a Design Office team working on a new discretionary investment platform. This example shows annotated UI design for Agent Dealing within the Order Management & Execution work package.

Work involved in reaching this stage included:

  • using existing knowledge of the share dealing business at Barclays,
  • review of business and functional requirements,
  • development of a relationship with the external agency that created the platform style guide and InDesign documentation framework
  • collaborative design and review with the wider project team.
